metadata.description: Versioned seed algorithms with sub-algorithm variants for iterative testing

v1.0.name: Basic RSI Momentum
v1.0.query: ( {33489} ( latest rsi14 > 40 and latest rsi14 < 70 and latest "close" > latest sma( latest "close" , 20 ) ) )

v1.1.name: Enhanced RSI + Volume
v1.1.query: ( {33489} ( latest rsi14 > 45 and latest rsi14 < 65 and latest "close" > latest sma( latest "close" , 20 ) and latest volume > latest sma( latest volume , 20 ) * 1.3 ) )

v1.2.name: MACD + Moving Average
v1.2.description: MACD crossover with moving average trend
v1.2.query: ( {33489} ( latest "close" > latest sma( latest "close" , 20 ) and latest sma( latest "close" , 20 ) > latest sma( latest "close" , 50 ) and latest volume > latest sma( latest volume , 10 ) * 1.1 ) )

v2.0.name: Multi-Timeframe Momentum
v2.0.query: ( {33489} ( latest "close" > latest sma( latest "close" , 20 ) and latest weekly per chg > 1 and latest monthly per chg > 3 and latest volume > latest sma( latest volume , 20 ) ) )

v1.0.name: Basic PE/PB Filter
v1.0.description: Simple P/E and P/B ratio filters
v1.0.query: ( {33489} ( latest pe < 25 and latest pe > 5 and latest pb < 3 and latest pb > 0.5 ) )

v1.1.name: Growth + Profitability
v1.1.query: ( {33489} ( latest pe < 30 and latest pe > 8 and latest roe > 15 and latest debt to equity < 1 ) )

v1.2.name: Quality + Efficiency
v1.2.query: ( {33489} ( latest roe > 18 and latest roa > 8 and latest debt to equity < 0.8 and latest current ratio > 1.2 ) )

v2.0.name: Advanced Fundamentals
v2.0.query: ( {33489} ( latest pe < 22 and latest roe > 20 and latest debt to equity < 0.6 and latest "dividend yield" > 0.5 and latest current ratio > 1.5 ) )

v1.0.name: Traditional Value
v1.0.query: ( {33489} ( latest pe < 15 and latest pb < 1.5 and latest "dividend yield" > 1 ) )

v1.1.name: Modern Value
v1.1.query: ( {33489} ( latest pe < 18 and latest pb < 2 and latest roe > 12 and latest debt to equity < 1.2 ) )

v1.2.name: Growth at Value
v1.2.query: ( {33489} ( latest pe < 20 and latest peg < 1.5 and latest roe > 15 and latest "close" > latest sma( latest "close" , 100 ) ) )

v1.0.name: Basic Quality
v1.0.query: ( {33489} ( latest roe > 15 and latest debt to equity < 1 and latest current ratio > 1 ) )

v1.1.name: Enhanced Quality
v1.1.query: ( {33489} ( latest roe > 18 and latest roa > 10 and latest debt to equity < 0.8 and latest current ratio > 1.3 and latest interest coverage > 5 ) )

v1.2.name: Consistency Focus
v1.2.query: ( {33489} ( latest roe > 15 and latest "close" > latest sma( latest "close" , 200 ) and latest debt to equity < 1 and latest "dividend yield" > 0.5 ) )

v1.0.0.name: Basic Fundamental Growth
v1.0.0.description: Initial seed algorithm focusing on fundamental growth metrics

momentum_basic.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma(close,20) and latest close > latest sma(close,50) and latest rsi(14) > 40 and latest rsi(14) < 70 and latest volume > latest sma(volume,20) * 1.2 ) )
momentum_basic.description: Basic momentum with RSI and volume confirmation

value_growth.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest ema(close,21) and latest ema(close,21) > latest ema(close,50) and latest volume > latest sma(volume,10) and latest rsi(14) > 35 and latest rsi(14) < 75 and latest "market cap" > 1000 ) )

quality_trend.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma(close,20) and latest volume > 100000 and latest "market cap" > 5000 and latest close > [0] 1 week ago close and latest macd line(26,12,9) > latest macd signal(26,12,9) ) )

v1.1.0.name: Enhanced Growth & Quality
v1.1.0.description: Enhanced algorithm with improved quality filters and momentum indicators

v2.0.0.name: Advanced Multi-Strategy
v2.0.0.description: Advanced algorithm combining best sub-algorithm variants

v2.1.0.name: Experimental High-Performance
v2.1.0.description: Experimental version testing latest sub-algorithm variants
